message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $900000. This is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counter with $875000. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $875000. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer, and that's $920000. This is the highest I'm willing to go, and I hope you can meet me at this price.

I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counter with $880000. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
